pageContext.claim: “Well, I haven't actually left the White House in months. And in all fairness, I'm doing a lot of other work. It’s not just that, but that's a very important element of what I'm doing, because we have to get the southern border done. And I've been here virtually every night, I guess every night other than one day I flew to Iraq and then to Germany to see our troops.”
pageContext.analysis: "Months" is a real exaggeration. The president travelled to Texas two days before he made this remarks.In December, Trump travelled to Kansas City to address a conference, Philadelphia for the Army-Navy football game, and Arlington National Cemetery. At the end of November, he played golf at one of his golf clubs and traveled to Buenos Aires.
